Metadata: Organizing and Operating a Fishery Cooperative Part One
Oregon State University Sea Grant Extension MAP
For Part II, see: ORESU-G-72-011. This is a Commercial Fishing Publication series.

The organization and operation of a successful fishery cooperative requires a knowledge and understanding of cooperative management and marketing concepts. This publication provides information about cooperative organization, management, and legal instruments used in organizing and operating a cooperative. It is available in two parts. This portion, part one, provides an overview of cooperative organization and operation. Part two provides greater detail about the legal instruments and requirements of a fishery cooperative.
